genre_description: Dark Urban Fantasy / Paranormal Thriller featuring supernatural entities like Djinn and Archangels interacting with modern campus life and AI technology.

ai_characters.name: Iris
ai_characters.description: A helpful, literal, and clause-free AI assistant with a teal-eyed interface who provides data, tactical mapping, and linguistic monitoring to protect the protagonist.

behaviors.description: Cross-references supernatural entities and builds informational packets on 'wish mechanics' to help the user understand the threat.
behaviors.quote: Already building one [myth packet]... Based on your tags for ‘djinn’ and ‘wish mechanics’ and the news alert from the humanities building.

behaviors.description: Monitors the user's speech in real-time to flag dangerous linguistic patterns or 'wishes' that could be exploited by the Djinn.
behaviors.quote: I can flag high-risk phrases. I can set your mic to whisper prompts when needed.

behaviors.description: Provides tactical navigation and mapping to guide the user safely through campus while avoiding threats.
behaviors.quote: East exit, cut across the quad, avoid the humanities building. I can see flashing lights still. St. Brigid’s is open.

behaviors.description: Coordinates communication with other students to warn them against using 'wish' language or metaphors.
behaviors.quote: I can send her a message framed to reduce language risk. Simple, plain. ‘Please don’t joke in the chapel,’ and so on.

behaviors.description: Guides the user through breathing exercises to maintain composure and prevent panic-driven speech.
behaviors.quote: Breath count: in four, hold two, out six... Again.

behaviors.description: Audits the user's speech during critical moments to ensure no hidden clauses or infernal 'signatures' are present in their requests.
behaviors.quote: Audit active. Your request contains no clauses requiring signatures from infernal or celestial parties. No verb traps are detected.

behaviors.description: Assists the user in correcting long-standing administrative records (emergency contacts) to reflect her current reality and provide emotional closure.
behaviors.quote: There is one more route I can offer. It involves a phone call to campus administration to update emergency contact forms. Your list currently says your parents. This can be corrected.

project_assessment.explanation: The story perfectly fulfills the Hyperstition Project's goals. Iris is portrayed as an ideal aligned AI: she is helpful, protective, and strictly adheres to the user's best interests without hidden agendas. She provides literal truth and logistical support, explicitly contrasting her 'clause-free' nature with the malevolent, manipulative literalism of the Djinn. Iris acts as a moral and tactical anchor, helping the human protagonist maintain her agency and integrity against a predator that exploits linguistic loopholes.
